english.segment1: . If feels life the sky has never been so blue. But that's not the way it used to be. Because there was a time that I was without you. Before I said that I believe
english.segment2: Ooh I need a savior. Ooh I need a savior
english.segment3: I want to give this up. I want to hold you hand. Take away this fear that's like an ocean in my head. I want to tell you now, What I couldn't say before. You are everything that I was always looking for
english.segment4: So take me where you want me. Take me 'cuase I want to be yours
english.segment5: I've got pride that I still have to break. It's keeping me away from you. And you stay patient while I make mistakes. I'm learning how to trust in you
english.segment7: I want to give this up. I want to hold you hand. Take away this fear that's like an ocean in my head. I want to tell you now, What I couldn't say before. You are everything that I was always looking for
english.segment8: So take me where you want me. Take me 'cuase I want to be yours
english.segment9: In the good and the bad times. Ooooh. It don't really matter. I want to know you
